main event: A UFO sighting was reported involving three revolving beacons observed in North Carver, Massachusetts on May 6th.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately three hours., The objects were described as stationary with a formation of three beacons following two singles., The observer reported seeing colors red, green, and blue., There were no radar returns or unidentified tracks observed during the event., The sighting may have been misidentified as Venus or another astronomical object.
witness description: Mr. J, an iron worker foreman, aged 30, who appeared frightened and sincere during the report.
